name: Galaxy Control: 3D Strategy
description: Build your base and battle with other players to control the galaxy! Galaxy Control is an ultimate space combat strategy game with fast-paced combats! Gather minerals and extract uranium, defend your base with laser towers, missile turrets, cannons, walls and mines.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista SP2 Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 3400 Series, GeForce 8600 GS DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: Compatible Sound Card with Latest Drivers
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.7 GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6670, GeForce GT 445M or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: Compatible Sound Card with Latest Drivers

reviews.review_text: Starcraft 2 altered asset flip. Much like 'Heroes and Titans: Online' was a blatant asset theft of Blizzards 'World of Warcraft' assets.  A chinese 'developer' steals from 'World of Warcraft' and now a russian one steals from 'Starcraft 2'. Blizzard is way too big for pulling stunts like that this game will be taken down in a matter of weeks. Just like Heroes and Titans: Online.  Aside from that, it's just another Clash of Clans copy/paste game. Mobile garbage in a nutshell.  If you in any way support the game or the developer or call yourself the developer of this game, you should be meeting the same end as Ramsay Bolton. In the caring embrace of his most beloved pets.  Edit #1: Quick reminder: It's common practice to reward players with ingame goods if they leave any positive review or critic on games like that. That's why there are positive reviews in the first place. Or just shills from the developer.
It's a bad mobile/Facebook game get the hell off steam
no its bad and a rip off of clash of clans do not get i warn please do not

Regardless of its original platform, this game falls flat to whom it copied clash of clans. Many reasons why this game fails such as pacing, requirementds, pathing, and clunky controls. everyone is better off grinding away on your town hall 9 .

If Im a commander, why is my ship blocked off? Why does a 3D strategy game need a story? Why do these flat rocks need names? Why is there sound, its space! How do my men stay on the ground? Why a massive arrow telling me where to go? Im not an idiot! Bad game 1/5 stars
The tutorial is too weird, if you really like Clash of Clans or some similar games, you can try this.
in 10 minutes crashed 5 times. nothing more to say.
Great game so worth the money
i want to play this game put wont load
